name: One Good Turn
location: Angel Falls; Girl in front of the church
request: Bring her a Tangleweb.
solution: Get it from the other side of the river near Angel Falls.
notes: Can be also be bought from Batsureg.

name: Pleased As Punch
location: Stornway; Girl in church
request: Do the Air Punch Party Trick
solution: Assign Air Punch as your Party Trick and perform it in front of the girl by holding B and selecting the assigned button.
notes: None

name: We Like To Party
location: Stornway; Girl in church
request: Do the Pirouette, Clap, Jump and Air Punch consecutively.
solution: Assign these Party Tricks and map them to the Down button. Hold B and press down to perform them in front of the girl.
notes: None

name: Pick Me Up a Panacea
location: Stornway; Man near the billboard
request: Bring him a Panacea.
solution: Use the Alchemy Pot.
notes: Refer to Alchemy Recipe Guide.

name: Herb'list
location: Stornway; Soldier inside the NW tower
request: Bring him an Medicinal Herb, Antidotal Herb, and a Moonwort Bulb.
solution: Common items in most item shops.
notes: None

name: Get Well Water
location: Stornway; Soldier inside the NW tower
request: Bring him an Angel's Tear.
solution: Get Fresh Water by the waterfall north of Slurry Quay and talk to the man on the bridge in Angel Falls twice for the Angel's Tear.
notes: None

name: Curious Crevice
location: Stornway; Man inside the Stornway Castle's well
request: Bring him a Slimedrop.
solution: Most Slimes drop this item.
notes: None

name: Don't Cry Over Spilt Ink
location: Stornway; Old Man inside Stornway Castle's library
request: Bring him Magic Water.
solution: Buy in Porth Llaffan's item shop or later shops.
notes: Alternate: Refer to Bestiary for item drop.

name: Labour Of Love
location: Stornway; Woman inside armour shop
request: Bring her an Evencloth.
solution: Steal from Ragged Reaper (#020).
notes: Alternate: Refer to Materials Map for spawn points.

name: Wings of Love
location: Stornway Checkpoint; Soldier inside the house
request: Bring him a Wing of Bat.
solution: Item drop from Drackmage (#020).
notes: None

name: The Not-So-Great Escape
location: Coffinwell; Man inside the well
request: Bring him Hammer Handrills.
solution: Use the Alchemy Pot.
notes: Refer to Alchemy Recipe Guide.

name: Putting on the Glitz
location: Porth Llafan; Bunny Girl inside the inn
request: Equip yourself with fancy attire.
solution: Equip Platinum gear (Sword, Shield, Headgear, Mail), Silver Bracelets, Red Tights, Acroboots and Bow Tie.
notes: Many combinations possible to complete this quest.

name: All Fired Up
location: Dourbridge; Old man near bonfire
request: Bring him something to burn.
solution: Give him any item.
notes: He will not burn a rare item.

name: Snug as a Thug
location: Dourbridge; Man in northern house
request: Bring him something fluffy.
solution: Give him Lambswool which can be bought in Batsureg's item shop.
notes: Alternate: Refer to Bestiary for item drop.

name: Collapsus's Call
location: Zere Rocks; Man on broken stairs before you enter the stone village
request: Bring him a Special Medicine.
solution: Use the Alchemy Pot.
reward: Granite Tunnel of Woe Lv. 1 Treasure Map
notes: Refer to Alchemy Recipe Guide.

name: Help Meowt Here!
location: Bloomingdale; Cat on the 2F of the inn
request: Meow?
solution: Buy Cat Ears in Bloomingdale, equip them and talk to the cat.
notes: None

name: You Shouldn't Have... Really
location: Angel Falls; Girl inside house near the entrance
request: Bring her 5 Belle Caps and 5 Fisticups.
solution: Find the mushrooms at their respective spawn points and bring them to the girl to receive the Packed Lunch. Bring the Packed Lunch to her father who is near the entrance of Hexagon and then report back to the girl in Angel Falls.
notes: Refer to the Materials Map for the spawn points.

name: Our Precious Precious
location: Mountain Pass; Woman at the north
request: Find the family's pet slime.
solution: Use the Alchemy Pot to create a Slood and Gooey Gear. Only have the hero in your party and only equip those two items on him or her. Defeat a Slime (#001) in battle and once it joins you report back to the woman.
notes: Refer to Alchemy Recipe Guide.

name: Moving House
location: Stornway; Old man at west of the town
request: Bring him a Raging Ruby.
solution: He gives you a Strength Ring and all you need is a Corundum to alchemize a Raging Ruby.
notes: Refer to Materials Map for spawn point for the Corundum.

name: A Masky Task
location: Stornway; Slim woman inside a house in the western part of town
request: Make a Papillon Mask.
solution: Use the Alchemy Pot.
reward: Stiletto heels for showing her the mask and a Jaguarment if you decide to give her the mask.
notes: Refer to Alchemy Recipe Guide.

name: Spud-She-Like
location: Stornway; Heavy woman inside a house in the west of town
request: Bring her a Sunstone.
solution: Use the Alchemy Pot.
notes: Refer to the Materials Map for the spawn points and the Alchemy Recipe Guide.

name: Mantle a la Mode
location: Stornway; Man inside the armour shop
request: Bring him a Macabre Mantle.
solution: Use the Alchemy Pot.
reward: Seed of Deftness for showing him the robe and a Lunar Fan if you decide to give him the robe.
notes: Refer to the Alchemy Recipe Guide.

name: Research Assistant
location: Stornway; Old Man inside Stornway Castle's library
request: Find information about Brigadoom inside the castle.
solution: Obtain three Magic Waters and check the opened red chest in the middle of Stornway Castle's treasure room for a Crumpled Note.
notes: Buy Magic Waters in Porth Llaffan.

name: Battering Batterflies
location: Zere; Man outside of the church
request: Scare 10 Batterflies.
solution: Have someone at a high enough level to make the Batterflies flee from you in battle. Level 25 is sufficient.
reward: Seed of Defence; Toad Oil for repeat
preReq: Need a character that has a high enough level to scare a Batterfly.
notes: None

name: Warbling Wellard
location: Zere; Thug outside church
request: Bring him a Birdsong Nectar.
solution: Use the Alchemy Pot.
notes: Refer to Alchemy Recipe Guide.

name: Doug and the Sluggers
location: Coffinwell; Old man near the northern house
request: Defeat 10 Sluggers (#035).
solution: Sluggers are found near Coffinwell.
notes: None

name: Big headed bard
location: Coffinwell; Bard on the east of town
request: Bring a Technicolour Dreamcloth to the nun in the church and report back to the bard.
solution: Use the Alchemy Pot.
notes: None

name: Desert Foxes
location: Gleeba; Read the sign SW of Gleeba in the desert. Check it from behind to accept the quest.
request: Defeat Parched Peckerels (#094) until you obtain 10 Duneberries.
solution: Defeat them around Gleeba and once you are done report to one of the dancers in the dancehall.
reward: Platinum Ore; Silver Platter for repeat
notes: This is a special item drop so the quest must be accepted in order for this item to drop.

name: Fool's Gold
location: Gleeba; Soldier in SW House in Gleeba
request: Defeat a fake Gold Golem.
solution: Defeat Gold Golems (#096) in the southern pit of the Djust Desert until the fake Gold Golem reveals himself.
notes: None

name: Wrapper's Delight
location: Gleeba; Soldier in SW House in Gleeba
request: Bring him 5 Grubby Bandages.
solution: They can be stolen from Mummy Boys (#044) in the Plumbed Depths in Gleeba.
reward: Ruby of Protection; Corundum for repeat
notes: Refer to the Beastiary for other monsters than can drop this item.

name: Feather for a Fan
location: Gleeba; Man inside the dancehall
request: Bring him 3 Hocus Chimera Feathers.
solution: Defeat Hocus Chimera (#076) until they drop the items. They are common encounters in Zere Rocks.
notes: This is a special item drop so the quest must be accepted in order for this item to drop.

name: Oil Get It
location: Gleeba; Merchant in center of town
request: Bring him Turbo Toad Oil.
solution: Defeat Expload (#097) with a Critical Hit. They can be found near the oasis in the Djust Desert. Thunder Thrust and Hatchet Man usable.
notes: This is a special item drop so the quest must be accepted in order for this item to drop.

name: Lady of the Dance
location: Gleeba; Book in the NW room of the castle
request: Find the Lady of the Dance.
solution: Defeat Goodybag (#151) around Batsureg until she teaches you the dance.
notes: None

name: A Simple Task
location: Batsureg; Girl in the center of the village
request: Get the 'Simple Simon' or 'Simple Simone' Accolade.
solution: If your Hero Is Female, as a Ranger equip: Headsman's Axe, Minotaur Helm, Jaguarment, Gloomy Gloves, Steppe Steppers, and Agiliboots. If your Hero is a male, then as a Priest equip: Sadistick, Dragon Shield, Hermetic Hat, Dark Robe, Heavy Handwear, Blue Jeans, Classy Clogs, and Utility Belt. Check your Battle Records to make sure you get the accolade and assign it in your profile.
preReq: Post-game access to Stornway's upgraded shop may be necessary.
notes: Refer to a shop list and the Alchemy Recipe Guide. Other combinations are possible.

name: All Dolled Up
location: Batsureg; Man in the SW tent
request: Retrieve the Ragdoll from the Brainy Badboon (#117).
solution: Brainy Badboon must be put to sleep with either Snooze or Kasnooze before you use Half-Inch to steal from him.
notes: This is a special item drop so the quest must be accepted in order for this item to drop.

name: Little Miss Bossy Boots
location: Swinedimples Academy; Girl inside the school, near the church
request: Bring her Holy Water and 2 Royal Soils.
solution: Buy the Holy Water and get the Royal Soil from the spawn points.
reward: Salute Party Trick; Thunderball for repeat
notes: Refer to the Materials Map for the spawn point locations.

name: Funghi for a Fun Guy
location: Pluvi Island; small island southeast of Gleeba, Man inside a well
request: Bring him 3 Belle Caps.
solution: Find them at spawn points.
reward: Finessence; Magic Beast Horn for repeat
notes: Refer to the Materials Map for the spawn points.

name: Muffled Admiration
location: Wormwood Creek; Man inside weapons shop
request: Give a scarf to 3 types of Sanguini.
solution: Defeat each Sanguini until they accept the scarf. Teeny Sanguini (#003) is by Angel Falls, Pink Sanguini (#080) is by Bloomingdale and the Genie Sanguini (#189) is on a small island north of the lake by Stornway.
reward: Elfin Elixir; Mystifying Mixture for repeat
notes: None

name: Follow That Fish
location: Porth Llaffan; Jona's House in the SE of the village
request: Summon Lleviathan and defeat him.
solution: Talk to the ghost in Porth Llaffan at night. Buy or alchemize a Watermaul Wand, Flowing Dress and Silver Shield. Talk to Jonah once you have them and go to the summit of Tywll Cave and equip the gear. Talk to Jonah again, defeat Lleviathan and eat the Fygg.
reward: Sterling's Whistle which can summon the Starflight Express
notes: Story, Check shop list or Alchemy Recipe Guide for the required equipment.

name: Man Eating Vegetables
location: Angel Falls; Woman inside the item shop
request: Get The 'Herbalist' Accolade.
solution: Use herb items 100 times to earn the accolade. Check your Battle Records to make sure you get it and assign it in your profile.
notes: None

name: Style Gooru
location: Angel Falls; Professor by the well
request: Bring him a Goododendron which is dropped by Slime (#001).
solution: Defeat Slimes until you get the flower
reward: Seed of Agility; Nectar for repeat
notes: This is a special item drop so the quest must be accepted in order for this item to drop.

name: Letter Getter
location: Stornway; Man lying down near the church
request: Bring him a Crumpled Letter which is dropped by Bling Badger (#251)
solution: Bling Badgers can be found in high level Water grottos. Keep defeating them until you receive the letter.
preReq: Post-game; Access to high level Water grottos
notes: This is a special item drop so the quest must be accepted in order for this item to drop.

name: Maid To Wait
location: Stornway; Old man inside southern house
request: He wants to talk to his maid.
solution: Buy a Maid's Mop and Maid's Outfit and equip your character with both item and talk to the man. The maid equipment can be bought from the secret shop in Dourbridge.
notes: Both genders can equip the maid equipment.

name: A Climber for a Climber
location: Coffinwell; Woman near the northern house
request: Obtain a 100 cm Beardy Weirdy from a Treevil.
solution: Defeat Treevils (#110) in Urdus Marshland with the Fisticuff Stone's Throw ability. You will automatically keep throwing away the Beardy Weirdies you win if it is lower than 100 cm.
notes: None

name: Tale of the Paper Trail
location: Coffinwell; Woman near the SE house
request: Retrieve 3 pieces of the Torn Exam Paper.
solution: Fight random monsters around Coffinwell until you obtain all three pieces.
notes: None

name: Puttin'em In Platinum
location: Coffinwell; Woman inside western house
request: Give her all of the Platinum gear (Sword, Shield, Headgear, Armour).
solution: Buy the sword and headgear in Gleeba, buy the shield in Bloomingdale and alchemize the armour.
notes: Story, Refer to the Alchemy Recipe Guide

name: Dozy Mayor
location: Porth Llafan; The man inside the mayor's house
request: Wake up the mayor.
solution: Obtain some Freshwater from spawn point at Slurry Quay and return to Angel Falls and speak to the man by the bridge so he can give you the Angel's Tear. Report back to the man in the mayor's house.
notes: Alternate: Refer to Materials Map for other spawn points.

name: A Task for a Cask
location: Slurry Quay; Barrel at the dock
request: Bring it Holy Water, Freshwater and Magic Water.
solution: Buy the Holy Water and Magic Water from item shops and get Fresh Water from the spawn points.
notes: Refer to Materials Map and shop list for location of the items. Gleeban Guinea is the reward for repeating this request.

name: Rock On!
location: Zere Rocks; Boy near the church
request: Show him a Resurrock, an Enchanted Stone and an Agate of Evolution.
solution: Resurrock appears at spawn points. Use the Alchemy Pot to creat an Enchanted Stone and an Agate of Evolution.
notes: Refer to the Materials Map and Alchemy Recipe Guide.

name: Confession of Cin'
location: Bloomingdale; Nun in the church
request: Bring her a Dead Man's Dagger from the Bloody Mummy (#146) in Bowhole.
solution: Keep killing Bloody Mummies until the item drops.
notes: This is a special item drop so the quest must be accepted in order for this item to drop.

name: A Martyr to His Ma
location: Gleeba; Soldier in SW house in Gleeba
request: Bring him a Sainted Soma and take it to his mother in Wormwood Creeks item shop. She'll give you a Package from Ma to return to him.
solution: Use the Alchemy Pot.
notes: Refer to the Alchemy Recipe Guide.

name: Tall Order Cook
location: Gleeba; Cook inside the castle
request: Bring him vegetables from Zere.
solution: Talk to the farmer outside the church in Zere and he'll ask for Horse Manure x3 and Cowpat x7. Obtain them from their respective spawn points and give them to the farmer. Report to the chef in Gleeba.
notes: Refer to Materials Map for spawn points.

name: Magmalice Mania
location: Wormwood creek; Boy in item shop
request: Get a Magmalice Handprint.
solution: Defeat Magmalice (#168) in Magmaroo until they drop the item.
reward: Prince's Pea Coat; Bow Tie for repeat
notes: This is a special item drop so the quest must be accepted in order for this item to drop.

name: Moai Memorabilia
location: Wormwood creek; Girl inside the inn
request: Get a Mega Moai Headprint.
solution: Defeat mega moai (#167) in Magmaroo until they drop the item.
reward: Princess's Robe; Pink Pearl for repeat
notes: This is a special item drop so the quest must be accepted in order for this item to drop.

name: Mummy's Little Hero
location: Pool of Spirits Cave (NE of Angel Falls); Boy in cave
request: Bring him a Wakerobin.
solution: Buy it in Bloomingdale.
notes: This is a special item drop so the quest must be accepted in order for this item to drop.

name: Nicholas's Necklace
location: Island at eastern Stornway; Man in southern house
request: Retrieve the Memento Necklace.
solution: After accepting the request, speak the man in the northern house at night to discover that the necklace was stolen by an Abyss Diver (#170). Keep fighting this monster near the four corners of the sea until it drops the item.
reward: Seed of Defence; Strength Ring for repeat
preReq: Post-game; Sterling's Whistle, Finish Quest 57 to repeat this quest
notes: This is a special item drop so the quest must be accepted in order for this item to drop.

name: Not Nicholas's Necklace
location: Island at eastern Stornway; Man in northern house
request: Retrieve the Memento Necklace.
solution: At night speak to the man in the southern house to find out that a Pink Sanguini (#080) stole the necklace. Defeat them in Bloomingdale until the item drops.
reward: Seed of Agility; Agility Ring for repeat
notes: This is a special item drop so the quest must be accepted in order for this item to drop.

name: Fixing the Sicklops
location: Newid Isle (Tree on cliff near Alltrades Abbey); Boy on the cliff
request: Steal a Titanic Tincture from Atlas when his life is below 700 HP.
solution: Atlas (#289) is a mid to high level grotto boss depending on how many times your Hero has revocated. Do 6000 damage to him and then begin to use Half-Inch to steal the Titanic Tincture.
preReq: Post-game, Sterling's Whistle, Half-Inch, mid to high level grottos
notes: None

name: Runny Bunny
location: Hill east of Wormwood Creek; Bunny Girl inside northern well
request: Bring her Metal Slime Sollerets.
solution: You have a 1% chance to find these in a Rank A blue treasure chest which are found in high level grottos.
preReq: Post-game; Sterling's Whistle, access to high level grottos
notes: None

name: That Makes Scents
location: Mountains east of Wormwood creek; Girl inside southern well
request: Give her ingredients for her incense.
solution: She requires Nectar, Narspicious, and Thinkincense. You can get them from their spawn points.
notes: Refer to the Materials Map for spawn point locations.

name: Mager Migraine
location: Well on a hill, north of Upover; Man inside the well
request: Bring him Hexite from Shogum.
solution: Fight Shogum (#285) who is a boss in the low level grottos until he drops the item.
notes: This is a special item drop so the quest must be accepted in order for this item to drop.

name: Brian's Dyin' Wish
location: Cringle Coast, most NE island; Skeleton in cave
request: Get the Larrrst Letter.
solution: Defeat Salamarauder (#060) in Tywll Cave until they drop the item and report back to the skeleton.
notes: This is a special item drop so the quest must be accepted in order for this item to drop.

name: Keep Your Eyes Peeled
location: Swinedimples Academy; Man inside the church
request: Find the red postsign.
solution: On the island east of the Bowhole, read the red sign from the back and report back to the man.
notes: None

name: Turn In Your Badges
location: Swinedimples Academy; Man inside the church
request: Obtain the 5 badges.
solution: Fight the enemies outside the following locations in this order: Bloomingdale, Gleeba, Angel Falls, Coffinwell and Swinedimples Academy. Once you get a badge from an area, move on to the next one.
notes: This is a special item drop so the quest must be accepted in order for this item to drop.

name: Operation Mercury
location: Swinedimples Academy; Man in the western hallway in the school
request: Defeat 3 Metal Medleys (#089) with Pressure Point.
solution: Fight them in bad cave with this skill. Equiping Demon Spear will incrase your chances of getting an instant kill.
notes: None

name: Operation Multithrust
location: Swinedimples Academy; Man in the western hallway in the school
request: Defeat 2 Gloomy Gastropogs (#172) at the same time with Multithrust. Do this 5 times.
solution: They can be found around the Gittish Empire. Oomph and Egg On your Spear user.
notes: None

name: Nab the Knife-Nicker
location: Swinedimples Academy; Woman in the 1F of the dormitory
request: Defeat Shivery Shrubbery (Monster 125) with Toxic Dagger while it is asleep until it drops the Broken Blade.
solution: Fight near Swinedimples and put them to sleep with Snooze or Kasnooze then use Toxic Dagger to kill them until the item is dropped.
notes: This is a special item drop so the quest must be accepted in order for this item to drop.

name: Spice up Your Knife
location: Swinedimples Academy; Woman in the 1F of the dormitory
request: Defeat 10 poisoned Bad Karmours (#186) with Victimiser.
solution: Defeat them in this manner in Oubliette.
notes: None

name: You Scratch My Back...
location: Swinedimples Academy; Old man on the western part of campus
request: Retrieve his Backstratcher.
solution: Talk to the heavy man by the item shop in Slurry Quay. Defeat Salamarauders (#060) in Tywll cave until they drop the item.
notes: This is a special item drop so the quest must be accepted in order for this item to drop.

name: Look, Back in Anger
location: Swinedimples Academy; Old man on the western part of campus
request: Get medicine for his shoulders.
solution: Speak with the woman on the 2F of the school. Get Molten Magma by defeating Live Lavas (#165) from Magmaroo and Toad Oil by defeating Gloomy Gastropogs (#172) in the Gittish Empire. Bring them back to the old man.
preReq: Finish Quest 69, Wand Skill 100, Quests 77 or 78 NOT in progress
notes: This is a special item drop so the quest must be accepted in order for this item to drop.

name: Staunch the Stench
location: Swinedimples Academy; Blond man in western hallway in the school
request: Defeat Stenchurion (#171) found in the sea north of Gleeba with Deliverance until you receive the Mirror of Reflection.
solution: The Stenchurion you defeat must be found in the sea north of Gleeba. Other Stenchurions will not drop the item.
notes: None

name: Jump for Joy
location: Swinedimples Academy; Blond man in western hallway in the school
request: Defeat Nemean with a normal attack while equipped with a Laundry Pole to receive the Staff Scroll.
solution: Buy the weapon in Stornway and Nemean (#284) is a low level grotto boss. Do about 2500 damage to him until you start hitting him with the Laundry Pole.
preReq: Finish Quest 71, Staff Skill 100, Access to low level grottos
notes: This is a special item drop so the quest must be accepted in order for this item to drop. Must be night time to receive the quest.

name: Whipping Boy's Wish
location: Swinedimples Academy; Boy on 2F of school
request: Get Mr. Whippy a new whip.
solution: Talk to the Bunny Girl outside the Lighthouse and bring her a Hammer Fang. Power Hammers (#095) drop them near Gleeba. Bring it back to the Bunny Girl then report back to the boy.
notes: This is a special item drop so the quest must be accepted in order for this item to drop.

name: Mr Whippy Wish
location: Swinedimples Academy; Man on 1F of dormitory
request: Run an errand for Mr. Whippy.
solution: Talk to the Bunny Girl outside the Lighthouse and defeat Dreadful Drackal (Monster 175) which can be found around the Gittish Empire and Drastic Drackal (Monster 155) which can be found around Wyrmtail with the Leather Whip. Buy the Leather Whip from Stornway. Report back to the girl to receive Catwright's Parcel and give the Parcel to the man in the dormitory.
notes: None

name: Rake a Tail Feather
location: Swinedimples Academy; Man in the eastern room on the 1F of the school
request: Get 10 Tinny Tail Feathers by defeating Robo-robin (#112) with Can Opener.
solution: Defeat them around Batsureg until you get 10 feathers. They are 100% drops if you defeat them with Can Opener.
notes: This is a special item drop so the quest must be accepted in order for this item to drop.

name: The Talonted Trio
location: Swinedimples Academy; Man in eastern room on the 1F of the school
request: Defeat his three apprentices with Claws equipped.
solution: Defeat Tearwolf (#126) at the south of Swinedimples Academy; report back and go to the Gittish Empire and within Oubliette B3, defeat Claws (#183); report back and defeat King Crab (# 188) at the four corners of the ocean. He must be defeated there in order to get the scene.
reward: "The Core of the Claw": Hand of God ability
notes: None

name: Cool-Fanned Kook
location: Swinedimples Academy; Woman in the eastern hallway on the 2F of the school
request: Bring her a Freezing Feather.
solution: Defeat Apeckalypse (#128) outside of Swinedimples until they drop it.
notes: This is a special item drop so the quest must be accepted in order for this item to drop.

name: Oh The Indignity
location: Swinedimples Academy; Woman in the eastern hallway on the 2F of the school
request: Defeat a Liquid Metal Slime (#153) with Fandango while wearing the Bunny Ears and the Bunny Tail.
solution: Buy the Bunny Tail in Zere and either buy the Bunny Ears in the secret shop in Dourbridge or use the Alchemy Pot to create them. Liquid Metal Slimes can be encountered in the Bowhole or Slime Hill.
notes: Talk to the woman who gave you the quest once more with the bunny ears and bunny tail equipped before you set out or the kill won't count.

name: Bring Oi Back Me Axe
location: Swinedimples Academy; Man near the fountain
request: Bring him back his axe back from the Treevil that took it (#110).
solution: Defeat Treevils in Urdus Marshland until the drop Max's axe.
notes: This is a special item drop so the quest must be accepted in order for this item to drop.

name: 'Atchet Job
location: Swinedimples Academy; Man near the fountain
request: Defeat 3 Magmalices (#168), 3 Stone Guardians (#178) and 3 Bad Karmours (#186) with Hatchet Man.
solution: Magmalice are found in Magmaroo and both the Stone Guardians and Bad Karmours can be found in Oubliette.
notes: None

name: Mallet's Mallet
location: Swinedimples Academy; Female student in the middle room on the 2F of the school
request: Repair her hammer.
solution: Go to the library on the 1F and read Mallet Monthly. Go to the Plumbed Depths of Gleeba and defeat Admirer (#099) until you get the Wobbly Jelly.
notes: This is a special item drop so the quest must be accepted in order for this item to drop.

name: To Shell and Back
location: Swinedimples Academy; Woman in the west room near the entrance of the school
request: Defeat a Liquid Metal Slime (#153) with Bagsy Last while equipped with a Tortoise Shell.
solution: Buy the Tortoise Shell at Porth Llaffan. Knock off 5 to 6 HP on the Liquid Metal Slime before you use Bagsy Last.
notes: None

name: Beautiful Bowginnings
location: Swinedimples Academy; Thug inside the theatre
request: Defeat 10 Peckerels (Monster 114) with Flutter Disaster.
solution: Fight them around Batsureg.
notes: None

name: Beauty and Beyond
location: Swinedimples Academy; Thug inside the theatre
request: Defeat 10 Boss Trolls (Monster 179) with Rain of Pain.
solution: Before you fight the Boss Trolls in Oubliette, create the Wonder Pants with the Alchemy Pot. Once you are done defeating 10 Boss Trolls with Rain of Pain, report back to the thug.
reward: "Archery for the Adept": Shining Shot ability
notes: None

name: Comeback Kid
location: Swinedimples Academy; Boy outside of theatre
request: Defeat a Metal Slime (#046) with Power Throw.
solution: Fight them in Quarantomb or Slime Hill near Angel Falls if you have Sterling's Whistle. Report back to the boy once you have done this, then walk over to the bridge that is to the west of Swinedimples to see a scene. Report back to the boy in Swinedimples after the scene is over.
notes: None

name: Brave the Caves
location: Swinedimples Academy; Girl outside of the dormitory
request: Complete the Boomerang Master Exam.
solution: Go to the art room on the 2F of the school and check the glowing spot. Defeat the following monsters with the Boomerang until they each drop an item: Mortoad (#062) in Tywll Cave, Hunter Mech (#087) in the Bad Cave, Living Statue (#150) in the Bowhole. You should receive "Basic Boomeranging", "Better Boomeranging", and "Bonzer Boomeranging".
notes: This is a special item drop so the quest must be accepted in order for this item to drop.

name: Sucking Up to Buckler
location: Swinedimples Academy; Man in the west room near the school entrance
request: Block 10 attacks with your shield.
solution: Go into battle and the blocking will happen automatically. If you have more skill points in your Shield Skill and a better shield then your chance to block a hit increases.
notes: None

name: Buckler's Buckler
location: Swinedimples Academy; Man in the west room near the school entrance
request: Defeat 10 Killing Machines (#174) using Blockenspiel.
solution: They can be found around the Gittish Empire.
reward: "Secrets of the Shield": Prevents critical attacks
notes: None

name: Way of the Fitht
location: Swinedimples Academy; Martial artist inside the theatre
request: Defeat 10 Wyrtles (#106) with Knuckle Sandwich.
solution: Fight them around Urdus Marshland or Hermany.
notes: None

name: One Latht Tehth
location: Swinedimples Academy; Martial artist inside the theatre
request: Defeat 50 enemies on the 10F or deeper of any grotto while wearing no equipment.
solution: This requires a high level grotto in order to complete. Your level for your character should also be high. You may also want a Paladin or Warrior to always protect your unequipped character if their level is too low.
preReq: Finish Quest 89, Fisticuff Skill 100, Access to a high level grotto
notes: None

name: Critical Appraisal
location: Wormwood Creek; Farmer to the south of the village
request: Defeat 2 enraged enemies with normal critical hits. Thunder Thrust and Hatchet Man don't count.
solution: Use the Warrior's Whistle ability to enrage the monsters and keep trying until you defeat two enraged monsters with critical hits.
notes: None

name: Warriors Three
location: Wormwood creek; Farmer to the south of the village
request: Defeat 10 enraged Mandrake Marauders (#166).
solution: Fight them in Magamaroo and use Whistle to enrage them.
notes: None

name: Eggclesiastic
location: Wormwood Creek; Old man inside well
request: Defend against enemy attacks 30 times. If you run away from battle, the times you defended will not count.
solution: You can defend with everyone, not just the Priest. Must battle in area outside of Wormwood Creek.
notes: None

name: Nurtural Selection
location: Wormwood Creek; Old man inside well
request: Heal a character with critical HP (red) with Moreheal 20 times.
solution: Must be done in battle. Damage floors can help you lower your HP.
notes: None

name: Free the Faerie Two
location: Alltrades Abbey; Sleep at the inn with a Lv 15 Mage in your party
request: Defeat 10 enemies with Frizz while equipped with the Faerie Staff.
solution: Any enemies will do.
notes: None

name: Faerie Nearly There
location: Alltrades Abbey; Sleep at the inn with a Lv 40 Mage in your party
request: Defeat 10 Wight Priests (#135) with normal attacks while equipped with the Faerie Staff.
solution: Fight them in the Old School at Swinedimples. You can use Oomph and raise the tension of your mage to attack the Wight Priests.
notes: None

name: Cry Wolf
location: Alltrades Abbey; Martial Artist at the entrance
request: Defeat 5 Scarewolves (#081) while they are scared with the Martial Artist's War Cry skill.
solution: Fight them around Bloomingdale. They must be defeated in the same round they are stricken with fear.
notes: None

name: Slowly, Slowly, Critty Golem
location: Alltrades Abbey; Old man at the entrance
request: Defeat three Golems (#161) with normal critical hits. Thunder Thrust and Hatchet Man do not count.
solution: Fight them around the Lonely Coast or near Upover.
notes: None

name: B-Coming one of the B-Team
location: Dourbridge; Thief inside the bar
request: Steal a Tycoon's Trove from Hunter Mech (#087).
solution: You can find them inside the Bad Cave. Use the Half-Inch ability to steal the item from them.
reward: Rogue Robe, Roguess Robe and 1000 gold
notes: You must accept this quest in order to steal this special item.

name: Busted
location: Dourbridge; Thief inside the bar
request: Steal a Lunar Diamond from a Sorcerer (#120).
solution: Find the monster in Gerzuun's basement. You must steal from the one in the basement.
reward: "Thief's Theory": ability to steal after battle, 10,000 gold
notes: You must accept this quest in order to steal this special item.

name: Eggstreme Sport
location: Alltrades Abbey; Ghost in the bar
request: Use the Hero's ability Egg On to reach a state of super tension (100) 5 times.
solution: You don't need to defeat any enemies with super high tension.
notes: None

name: Prat's the way to do it!
location: Alltrades Abbey; Ghost in the bar
request: Do a critical Pratfall twice.
solution: You will receive a message in battle when you have done a critical Pratfall. Use the skill Pratfall until you get a critical strike. You can do a single critical pratfall to two monsters at the same time. This will meet the quota. Revisit the ghost and then talk to the prisoner in the jail in Stornway Castle. He is located in the 2nd cell on the top of the screen.
notes: None

name: Gladiator Graduator
location: Alltrades Abbey; Priest near the inn
request: Defeat 3 Slimes (#001) with Dragon Slash while in a state of super high tension (100).
solution: Slimes near Alltrades Abbey don't escape but they do fuse.
notes: None

name: Glad to be of service
location: Island east of Hermany; Man on the island
request: Defeat 10 Drackals (#118) while under the effect of Double Up.
solution: You can find them outside of Gerzuun.
notes: None

name: Challengus Maximus
location: Island east of Hermany; Man on the island
request: Defeat 3 Green Dragons with Double-Edged Slash while envenomated and under the effect of Double Up.
solution: If your levels are too high, take off some armour so you have a better chance of getting poisoned. You can also use the Warrior's ability Whipping Boy to protect another person so that you can increase your chances of getting poisoned.
notes: None

name: Taking Soul Control
location: Gleeba; Paladin on Gleeba's roof
request: Use the Warrior's ability Whipping Boy 10 times.
solution: Multiple people can use the skill if they have learned it.
notes: None

name: Off the Record
location: Gleeba; Paladin on Gleeba's roof
request: Defeat 3 Infernal Armours (#123) with Pincushion.
solution: Fight them in Gerzuun. Knock off about 100 HP and then start using Pincushion. It would be better if your whole party knew this ability. If you levels are too high and you aren't doing any damage to the Infernal Armours, then unequip all your equipment except for a weak weapon, use the Gladiator ability Double Up and change to a very low levelled vocation.
notes: None

name: Top-Flight Knight Fight
location: Gleeba; Paladin on Gleeba's roof
request: Use H-Pathy on a character with only 1 HP 5 times in battle.
solution: Have two people who know H-Pathy in your party. Have one character keep giving HP to another character until his HP drops to 1. Then have the other character who knows H-Pathy use the skill on him. You can only do this once per battle so finish that battle and do it four more times. Alternatively, you can go to a dungeon area that has damaging tiles (like poison, electricity, lava, etc) and walk until you have a a character at 1 HP. Then go into a battle and use H-Pathy.
notes: None

name: Elementary Training
location: Alltrades Abbey; Man in red inside Alltrades Abbey
request: Defeat 2 Metal Slimes (#046) while under the effect of the Mage's ability, Wizard Ward.
solution: The person who cast Wizard Ward must deal the finishing blow. Knock of 2 to 3 HP and have the other Wizard Ward character defeat the Metal Slime. You can fight them in Quarantomb.
notes: None

name: Force in the Field
location: Alltrades Abbey; Man in red inside Alltrades Abbey
request: Defeat 10 White Tigertaurs (#130) by successfully casting the Armamentalist's Sap spell on them twice and by defeating them while under the effect of Fire Fource.
solution: You can find them north of Swinedimples.
notes: None

name: The Fource...Forever
location: Alltrades Abbey; Man in red inside Alltrades Abbey
request: Defeat various monsters with each Fource effect.
solution: In Magmaroo use the technique Fire Fource to defeat Magmalice (#168), around Swinedimples use Ice Fource to defeat Great Gruffon (#129), around Upover use Gale Fource to defeat Cumulus Rex, around Bloomingdale let 8 Slimes combine into King Slime (#080) and use Life Fource to defeat it. Finally use Funereal Fource to defeat Raving Reaper (#134) in the Old School in Swinedimples. Report back to the man in the Abbey.
reward: "Armamentalist Album": Fource abilities can effect the whole party
notes: None

name: Ranger Changer
location: Heights of Loneliness Entrance; The man at the entrance
request: Defeat 3 Hocus Chimaerae with Knife Skill, Toxic Dagger. They must die with poison damage.
solution: Poison the enemy as soon as you can. Attack with a weak character and do about 50 damage to them. They will use Midheal so you may have to wait until they run out of MP before they finally die from poison damage.
notes: None

name: Hoarse Whisperer
location: Heights of Lonlieness Entrance; The man at the entrance
request: Use Soothe Sayer 20 times on an enraged enemy.
solution: Enrage an enemy with the Warrior's Whistle ability and then use theb Ranger's Soothe Sayer ability to calm them down. You can do this multiple times in a battle.
notes: None

name: One-Turn Wonder
location: Heights of Loneliness Entrance; The man at the entrance
request: Defeat Drakularge (#152) in one turn 5 times.
solution: Find them in the Bowhole.
reward: "Ranger's Revelations": Chance for critical increases when HP is low
notes: None

name: Sages in the Pages
location: Gittingham Palace ; Bookshelf on 2F
request: Defeat 5 Great Trolls (#196) with the Mage's spell, Frizz.
solution: You can find them in the Realm of the Mighty. Do about 700 damage to them before you start using Frizz.
notes: None

name: Sagier and Pagier
location: Gittingham Palace ; Bookshelf on 2F
request: Defeat Equinox (#283) with the Mage's or Sage's Bang spell.
solution: Equinox is the first grotto boss and he can also be found in other low level grottos. Do about 1600 damage to it before you start attacking with Bang.
preReq: Lv 15 Sage, Access to a low level grotto
notes: None

name: Engaging the Sage
location: Gittingham Palace ; Bookshelf on 2F
request: Defeat Atlas (#289) with the Sage's Zam spell.
solution: Atlas is a mid to high level grotto boss depending on how many revocations you have done. Do about 6300 damage to him before you start using Zam. Increase the power of Zam with the Mage's Channel Anger ability.
preReq: Finish Quest 116, Lv 40 Sage, Access to a mid to high level grotto
notes: None

name: A Star is Born
location: Gleeba; Pink haired girl inside dancehall
request: Defeat a Moai Minstrel (#248) with the Minstrel ability, Hot Lick.
solution: Moai Ministrels can be found in mid to high level Water and Nature grottos. Be careful when fighting it as it can use Kamikaze when its HP gets low. Knock off 500 HP before you start using Hot Lick.
preReq: Post-game, Access to mid to high level Water or Nature grottos
notes: None

name: Sign for Your Supper
location: Gleeba; Pink haired girl inside dancehall
request: Defeat an enemy with the Luminary's Autograph ability. It must be a critical hit.
solution: You will receive a message in battle when you have done a critical Autograph.
notes: None

name: Your Time to Shine
location: Gleeba; Pink haired girl inside dancehall
request: Defeat 10 Moai Minstrels (#248). You must do the Luminary's Extreme Makeover and then enrage it with Eyes on Me. Whoever used these skills must deal the deathblow.
solution: Maoi Ministrels can be found in mid to high level Water and Nature grottos. Knock off a chunk of its HP before you do your Extreme Makeover and Eyes on Me combo. Disco Stew is a good skill for your Luminary to use to kill it if your other skills are too weak.
preReq: Finish Quest 119, Lv 40 Luminary, Access to mid to high level Water or Nature grottos
notes: None

name: A Cloudless Skye
location: Upover; Girl on the stairs
request: Bring her a Clump of Cloud.
solution: Defeat Cumulus Rex (#158) around Upover with the Miracle Sword (32 mini medals or buy from WiFi shop) equipped until it drops the item.
notes: Available for download on Jul 16, 2010.

name: Bert's Berfday
location: Bloomingdale; Thug on 2F of Inn
request: Bring him a Birthday Cake and Party Popper.
solution: Both can be bought in the WiFi shop. Or received from special guests in the inn on your birthday.
notes: Available for download on Jul 23, 2010.

name: A Present From the Past
location: Stornway; Talk to Erinn from behind the counter in the inn
request: Retrieve a gift.
solution: Go to a grotto that has "of Doulour" in its title and defeat the boss in that grotto to receive a scene with Erinn.
preReq: DLC, Access to a Dolour grotto
notes: Story; Available for download on Jul 23, 2010.

name: Risque Respects
location: Stornway; Granny to the east of the town
request: Bring her a Dangerous Bustier.
solution: You can find one in a rank 5 Blue Treasure Chest in the grottos or use the Alchemy Pot if you have a Silk or Divine Buster.
preReq: DLC, Access to mid to high level grottos
notes: Available for download on Jul 30, 2010.

name: Perk Up, Patty!
location: Stornway; Talk to Erinn from behind the counter in the inn
request: Cheer Patty up.
solution: Talk to Patty from behind the counter then Zoom to Batsureg and talk to the chief's father, Batkhaan. Afterwards, go back to Stornway and talk to Patty again. At night, talk to the ghost in Batsureg and sail to Khalaag coast which is north of Batsureg. If you use the Starflight Express to get there then you will not get the scene. Examine the gravestone to the east to receive the Friendant. Report back to Patty.
notes: Story; Available for download on Jul 30, 2010.

name: Puff-Puff Performance
location: Hunter's Yurts; Girl to the west
request: Bring her a Cheer-me-up herb.
solution: Use Half-Inch to steal from Boss Troll (#179) in Oubliette until you get the item.
notes: You must accept this quest in order to steal this special item. Available for download on Aug 6, 2010.

name: A Right Royal Nightmare
location: Stornway; Talk to the king
request: Cure him of his nightmares.
solution: Talk to the woman in the east side of Wormwood Creek's church. Gather Malicitie, Manky Mud, and a Sage's Elixer for her. Bring her the ingredients and she will give you the Nightmare Nurse. Report back to the king.
notes: Story, Refer to the Materials Map for the Manky Mud and the Alchemy Recipe Guide for the rest. Available for download on Aug 6, 2010.

name: P-P-Pick Up a Pickaxe
location: Stornway; Thug inside Stornway Castle's well
request: Bring him a Platinum Pick.
solution: Defeat a Darkonium Slime in a mid to high level Ruins grotto until it drops the item.
preReq: DLC, Finish Quest 7, Access to mid to high level Ruins grottos
notes: Story; Available for download on Aug 13, 2010.

name: A Spot of Book-Keyping
location: Stornway; Talk to the princess
request: Help her unlock the book.
solution: Talk to the old man in Stornway's item shop. Clear a grotto with "Silver" in its title for the Little Key. Report back to the princess who is now in her room.
preReq: DLC, Finish Quests 23 and 127, Access to a Silver grotto
notes: Story; Available for download on Aug 13, 2010.

name: Exhume the Heirloom
location: Djust Desert; Talk to the ghost in the poison swamp at night, the swamp is to the west of Gleeba
request: Retrieve the Old Ring.
solution: Find the Old Ring by clearing a Water grotto.
preReq: DLC, Sterling's Whistle, Access to a Water grotto
notes: Available for download on Aug 20, 2010.

name: Making Room in Brigadoom
location: Stornway; Woman outside the church
request: Attend a meeting in Brigadoom.
solution: Go to the Brigadoom throne room and defeat 2 Scarlet Fevers (#242), afterwards go down the stairs for a scene and defeat the last one.
notes: Story; Available for download on Aug 20, 2010.

name: Tree-Hugging Titan
location: Newid Isle (Tree on cliff near Alltrades Abbey); Talk to the Cyclops
request: Scare off a Gigantes (#193) in the Tower of Nod.
solution: Do about 500 damage to the Gigantes and use the Ranger skill, Mercy to scare him away.
reward: Seed of Life; Ace of Clubs for repeat
notes: Available for download on Aug 27, 2010.

name: Recruitment Drive
location: Stornway; Man by the church
request: Convince the maid to join the brigade.
solution: Use the Alchemy Pot to create a Full Moon Axe and talk to the Maid on the 1F of Stornway castle. Report back to the man.
notes: Story; Available for download on Aug 27, 2010.

name: When Tax Attacks
location: Hermany; Man inside the house on the hill
request: Meet the tax collector.
solution: At night, defeat a Hunter Mech (#087) outside of the house.
notes: Available for download on Sep 3, 2010.

name: To Brigadoom!
location: Stornway; Talk to woman outside of church
request: Attend an inauguration at Brigadoom.
solution: Go to the Bridgadoom throne room and defeat Scarlet Fever (#242).
notes: Story; Available for download on Sep 3, 2010.

name: EXTERMINATE!
location: Hermany; Bookshelf in the house on the hill
request: Defeat 3 Metal Slimes (#046) in the same battle. Do this 3 times.
solution: Battle them on Slime Hill which is north of Angel Falls.
reward: Metal Slime Shield; Mini Medal for repeat
notes: Available for download on Sep 10, 2010.

name: Yore For It now!
location: Stornway; Talk to the king
request: Examine the coffin at the end of the tunnel inside the well in Stornway castle.
solution: Defeat Yore (#278).
notes: Story; Available for download on Sep 10, 2010.

name: Shaman You!
location: Small Island by lake near Stornway; Talk to the shaman
request: Equip 3 pieces of cursed equipment.
solution: If all of your cursed equipment is no longer cursed, you can use Malicites to curse them again.
notes: Can be done anytime after acquiring the ship. Available for download on Sep 17, 2010.

name: Has Sellma Sold Out?
location: Stornway; Talk to Erinn from behind the counter in the inn
request: Help Sellma.
solution: Talk to Sellma, then the banker from behind the counter. You should get the Guestbook. Now talk to Erinn and Sellma and leave for Gleeba. At Gleeba go into the Plumbed Depths and go through the magic door. Make your way to the graveyard and access the secret stairs to B3 to fight Rover (#279). Report back to Erinn.
notes: Story; Available for download on Sep 17, 2010.

name: Apt Pupil
location: Swinedimples Academy; Talk to Swindimple's ghost in the Old School at night
request: Use the Salute Party Trick to talk to him then accept the quest.
solution: Dress everyone in the Swinedimple Blazers (he gives them to you) and defeat Sir Sanguinus (#288) in a mid to high level grotto. Report back to Swinedimples and use the Salute again.
reward: Blessed Bindings, Tantric Trousers and Brahman Boots; Brainy Bracer for repeat
preReq: DLC, Finish Quest 36, Access to mid to high level grottos
notes: Available for download on Sep 24, 2010.

name: Coffinwell Conundrum
location: Coffinwell; Talk to Dr. Phlegming in his lab at night
request: Bring him the Encylopaedia Gittanica.
solution: It can be found on B3F in Oubliette.
notes: Story; Available for download on Sep 24, 2010.

name: Prayermongering
location: Pool of Spirits Cave (NE of Angel Falls); Ghost in cave
request: Fill a Gratite.
solution: Complete 5 more quests. You can redo the repeatable quests too.
reward: Metal Slime Helmet; Brighten Rock for repeat
notes: Available for download on Oct 1, 2010.

name: Thingy, King of, er…
location: Quarantomb; Ghost in B1F
request: Retrieve the Royal Seal.
solution: Use Half-Inch to steal the item from Trauminator (#286). He is a boss that can be found in low to mid level grottos.
notes: Story; Available for download on Oct 1, 2010.

name: Claws for Thought
location: Stornway; Ghost in weapon shop at night
request: Show him some Beastmaster Claws.
solution: Use the Alchemy Pot.
notes: Refer to the Alchemy Recipe Guide. Available for download on Oct 8, 2010.

name: Mysterious Monarch
location: Gittingham Palace; Talk to ghost of Goresby-Purrvis near the entrance
request: Defeat King Godfrey (#280).
solution: Find him on the 4F of Gittingham Palace and report back to Goresby-Purrvis once he is defeated.
notes: Story; Available for download on Oct 8, 2010.

name: Hail to the Queen
location: Inside the Starflight Express; Talk to Stella
request: Make her a new outfit.
solution: Bring her a Butterfly Wing, Technicolour Tutu, Sleeping Hibiscus and Mythril Ore.
notes: Story, Refer to Materials Map and Alchemy Recipe Guide. Available for download on Oct 15, 2010.

name: Licensed to Drive
location: Inside the Starflight Express; Talk to Sterling
request: Collect 9 Goretress Guerilla Stamps. Restrictions are that you can only land the Starflight Express 6 times & you can't use Zoom or Evac
solution: Sterling will give you the first stamp. Fly to Batsureg and talk to Conner behind a tent to get your next stamp. Fly to the Heights of Lonlieness and talk to Victor at the entrance. Walk to Bloomingdale and go to the church's rooftop to find Dusty. Fly to Angel Falls and to the west of the waterfall you will find Godfrey. Walk to Coffinwell and to the north west you will find Dodger. Fly to Alltrades Abbey and Cribber will be by the 1F stairs. Fly to Wormwood Creek to find Forger inside the weapon shop. Fly to the Goretress and the last member, Digby, will be at the top of the tower. Board the Starflight and use the inside view to talk to Sterling. Go to the locked door at the very back.
notes: Story; Available for download on Oct 22, 2010.

name: Flaptricide
location: Inside the Starflight Express; Talk to Stella
request: Help a girl in the inn at Dourbridge by giving her Stellar Medicine.
solution: Talk to the girl in the inn after accepting the quest. Bring Stella an Elfin Elixer, Perfect Panacea, Special Medicine and a Yggdrasil Bud. Fly to the Yggrdrasil spawn point to receive the Bud and use the Alchemy Pot to get the rest. Talk to Stella in the Starflight when you have everything. Bring the Stellar Medicine to the girl and report back to Stella in the Starflight.
notes: Story, Refer to Materials Map and Alchemy Recipe Guide. Available for download on Oct 29, 2010.

name: Intreeguing Mystery
location: Bloomingdale; Scholar in the center of town
request: Find proof of the Phantom Tree.
solution: Go to the tree on Pluvi Isle and check the shining spot. Go to Gleeba and talk to the priest in the church and then talk to the scholar in Bloomingdale. Head for the Ondor Cliffs to the west of Batsureg and read the three shining graves and report back to the scholar.
notes: Story; Available for download on Nov 5, 2010.

name: Annihilimobliteration!?
location: Inside the Starflight Express; Talk to Stella by the back
request: Defeat Tyrannosaura Wrecks (#281) in the locked room.
solution: After defeating the enemy, enter the portal for a scene and report to Stella afterwards.
notes: Story; Available for download on Nov 12, 2010.

name: Pushy Peddler
location: Lonley Coast, east of Zere Rocks; Man in cave
request: Bring him an Ethereal Stone.
solution: Use the Alchemy Pot.
reward: Malroth Map; Mythril Ore for repeat
notes: Refer to Alchemy Recipe Guide. Available for download on Nov 19, 2010.

name: Marey Questmas
location: Cringle Coast, most NE island; Talk to Chris Cringle in the house
request: Bring him 8 Heavenly Horseshoes.
solution: Defeat Tantamount (#239) in a mid to high level Volcano grotto in 5 turns to get a Heavenly Horseshoe. Do this 8 times and report back to Cringle.
reward: Estark Map; Technicolour Dreamcloth for repeat
preReq: DLC, access to a mid or high level Volcano grotto
notes: This is a special item drop so the quest must be accepted in order for this item to drop. Available for download on Nov 26, 2010.

name: Not-So-Jolly Roger
location: Wyrmtail; Skeleton in cave
request: Defeat Fowleye (#291) within 15 turns.
solution: He is a grotto boss that can be found in a mid to high level grotto.
preReq: DLC, Access to mid to high level grottos
notes: Available for download on Dec 3, 2010.

name: Nightmarey Questmas
location: Cringle Coast, most NE island; Bookshelf in the house
request: Defeat Night Knight (#199) with a Holy Water.
solution: You can fight them in the Realm of the Mighty. They have 256 HP. Remember to put a few Holy Waters in your item inventory.
reward: Cape of Good Karma; Mercury's Bandana for repeat
notes: Available for download on Dec 10, 2010.

name: Christinamas Cake
location: Bloomingdale; Girl by the item shop
request: Give a Christmas Cake to Santa.
solution: Buy the Christmas Cake from the Wi-Fi shop and give it to Chris Cringle at Cringle Coast and report back to the girl.
preReq: DLC, Cancel or Finish Quest #152 if active
notes: You will need to either cancel or finish Quest 152 if you have accepted it. Available for download on Dec 17, 2010.

name: Inn Search of an Inny
location: Stornway; Talk to Patty from behind the counter in the inn
request: Give her Birdsong Nectar, Astral Plume, Technicolour Dreamcloth and a Brilliant Biscuit.
solution: Brilliant Biscuit is dropped by Gem Jamboree (#207) which can be found in mid to high level Ruins grottoes. Use the Alchemy Pot for the rest of the items. Talk to Patty, then Erinn, then Patty once more.
notes: Story, Refer to Alchemy Recipe Guide. Brilliant Biscuit is a special item drop so you must accept this quest in order for it to drop. Available for download on Dec 26, 2010.

name: Inn for a Penny, Inn for an Inny
location: Stornway; Talk to Erinn from behind the counter in the inn
request: Defeat Octagoon (#219) 20 times.
solution: Talk to the king after initating quest. Fight Octagoon in mid to high level Ruin grottos. Report to the king once complete and then to Erinn.
preReq: DLC, Finish Quest 156, access to mid to high level Ruin grottos
notes: Story, Talk to the Special Guests in the Inn for their last piece of equipment. Available for download on Jan 1, 2011.

name: Battle Buff
location: Heights of Lonlieness Entrance; Talk to the man on the left
request: Defeat Trauminator (#286) without anything equipped.
solution: He is a grotto boss that can be found in mid level grottos.
reward: Mortamor Map; Raging Ruby for repeat
preReq: DLC, Access to mid level grottos
notes: Available for download on Jan 7, 2011.

name: Have You Seen Charlene?
location: Wormwood Creek; Mayor in his house
request: Bring 5 Sleeping Hibiscus and 2 Celestial Skeins to the girl in the cave north of Wormwood Creek.
solution: Buy the Sleeping Hibiscus in Bloomingdale & use the Alchemy Pot for the Yggdrasil Dew. Bring these to the girl and report to the mayor.
notes: Story, Refer to the Alchemy Recipe Guide. Available for download on Jan 14, 2011.

name: Chronic Delay
location: Wormwood Creek; Mayor in his house
request: Bring the dragon chronicler to Wormwood Creek.
solution: Talk to the man in Upover's Inn. Bring him a Lunaria, Aggressence and Trailblazing Bandana. Use the Alchemy Pot to make them. Then meet him on the summit of Magmaroo and report back to the mayor in Wormwood Creek.
notes: Story; Available for download on Jan 21, 2011.

name: Here With Nod's Tear
location: Bloomingdale; Mayoress in her house (not the mansion)
request: Bring a Dragon's Tear to the mayoress of Bloomingdale.
solution: Talk to the man by the item shop and he'll tell you that he will trade you his Dragon's Tear for a Crown Jewel. You can find a Crown Jewel by clearing a grotto that has more than 8 floors and also has "of Fear" in its title. After you make the trade report back to the mayoress in Bloomingdale.
notes: Story; Available for download on Jan 28, 2011.

name: Do Nod Disturb
location: Tower of Nod, north of Coffinwell; Slime by the entrance
request: Recover Nod's Tear.
solution: Go to the top of the tower and examine Nodoph. Then go to B4 of Oubliette and examine the shiny spot for Nod's tear. Battle Nodoph at the top of the Tower of Nod.
notes: Story; Available for download on Feb 4, 2011.

name: When a Star Wishes Upon You
location: Stornway; Talk to Pavo from behind the counter at the inn
request: Defeat Excalipurr (#292) for the Prayer Pearl.
solution: He is a grotto boss that can be found in a high level grotto and report back to Pavo once completed. Then go to the Realm of the Almighty and speak with Celestria. Talk to Pavo again and go to Angel Falls and talk to Aquila. Go back and talk to Pavo one last time.
preReq: DLC, Finish Quest 157, access to high level grotto
notes: Story; Available for download on Feb 11, 2011.

name: Fixing Fickser's Fix
location: Well on a hill, north of Upover; Man with the turban in the well
request: Bring him a Lucky Pendant.
solution: Use the Alchemy Pot.
reward: Crown of Clarity; Sorcerer's Ring for repeat
notes: Refer to Alchemy Recipe Guide. Available for download on Feb 18, 2011.

name: Shame on Goo
location: Angel Falls; Slime in the well
request: Defeat 8 different slimes.
solution: Defeat Metal Slime Knight (#75), Metal Medley (#89), Liquid Metal Slime (#153), Gem Jamboree (#207), Metal King Slime (#214), Slionheart (#215), Platinum King Jewel (#229) and Prime Slime (#252).
reward: Metal Slime Sword; Slime Crown for repeat
preReq: DLC, access to many different grottos
notes: Refer to the Beastiary as there are many locations for these enemies. Available for download on Feb 25, 2011.

name: Research and Destroy
location: Well on a hill, west of Batsureg; Man in the well
request: Defeat Elusid (#287) very quickly.
solution: He is a low level grotto boss. Beating him in 8 turns is good enough.
reward: Red Orb; Sorcerer's Stone for repeat
preReq: DLC, access to low level grottos
notes: Available for download on Mar 4, 2011.

name: Who's a Pretty Boy?
location: Cringle Coast, most NE island; Bird near the house
request: Defeat Bird Of Terrordise (#241) for the Jewellery Box and Terrodise Tail Feather.
solution: You can find it in high level Volcano grottos.
preReq: DLC, access to high level Volcano grottos
notes: Available for download on Mar 11, 2011.

name: Potty About Pots
location: Zere; Talk to the old man in the well
request: Get him some good earth from a Nature grotto.
solution: Complete a Nature grotto that is 12 or more floors deep to fill the Dirtbag. Report back to the old man.
reward: Hela's Hammer; Hephaestus's Flame for repeat
preReq: DLC, access to a Nature grotto
notes: Available for download on Mar 18, 2011.

name: Competition Commission
location: Stornway; Man to the north of the castle on 1F
request: Bring him a Sage's Stone.
solution: Use the Alchemy Pot.
notes: Refer to Alchemy Recipe Guide. Available for download on Mar 25, 2011.

name: Maiding and Abetting
location: Stornway; Maid in castle's kitchen
request: Bring her a Heavy Hatchet.
solution: It's a rare drop from AU-1000 (#227), a high level Ruins grotto monster. Also be found in rank B treasure chests in grottoes.
preReq: DLC, access to high level Ruins grotto
notes: Available for download on Apr 1, 2011.

name: I Would Do Anyfang for Love
location: Hunter's Yurts; Man at the northwest of the settlement
request: Bring him a Drakulord's Tooth.
solution: Defeat a Drakulord within 3 turns in a high level Water grotto.
notes: This is a special item drop so the quest must be accepted in order for this item to drop. Available for download on Apr 8, 2011.

name: Namesake Maker
location: Hill northeast of Stornway (Loch Storn)
request: Bring the man a Flame Tang knife.
solution: Use the Alchemy Pot.
notes: Refer to Alchemy Recipe Guide. Available for download on Apr 15, 2011.

name: Plum Duffer
location: Gleeba; Man by the armour shop
request: Bring him 10 Plum Stones.
solution: Defeat Seaverns (#256) in a high level Water grotto until you meet the quota.
preReq: DLC, access to high level Water grottos
notes: This is a special item drop so the quest must be accepted in order for this item to drop. Plum Stone is also a 100% drop. Available for download on Apr 22, 2011.

name: Agates Ain't Great…Are They?
location: Stornway; Talk to the ghost on the 3F of the castle
request: Bring it an Agate of Evolution.
solution: Use the Salute Party Trick to greet him before you show him the item. The item can be made with the Alchemy Pot.
notes: Refer to Alchemy Recipe Guide. Available for download on Apr 29, 2011.

name: If I'Ad an 'Ammer
location: Hill southwest of Stornway
request: Bring him a Megaton Hammer.
solution: Use the Alchemy Pot.
notes: Refer to Alchemy Recipe Guide. Available for download on May 6, 2011.

name: Well Forgetful
location: Well on a hill, south of Batsureg; Man in the well
request: Bring him some Cannibelle rage.
solution: Fight Cannibelle (#230) in mid to high level Ice grotto. Use the Warrior's skill, Whistle to enrage her 10 times. You can also fight Cannibelles on the island east of Stornway that has two cabins, and they are found as an uncommon spawn.
preReq: DLC, access to mid to high level Ice grottos
notes: Available for download on May 13, 2011.

name: Tones of the Bones
location: Wyrmtail; Skeleton in cave
request: Bring him a Bone Chimer.
solution: Defeat Blight Knight (#237) in a high level Ice grotto with a the Hammer skill, Heart Breaker until he drops the item.
reward: Rusty Armour; Saint's Ashes for repeat
preReq: DLC, access to a high level Ice grotto
notes: Available for download on May 20, 2011.

name: From Rust to Riches
location: Brigadoom; Grave to the northeast once you enter
request: Equip all of the Erdrick equipment (Sword, Shield, Helmet, Armour and Gauntlets).
solution: Use the Alchemy Pot to make them, equip them and examine the grave again.
notes: Refer to Alchemy Recipe Guide. Available for download on May 27, 2011.

name: Pants Macabre
location: Wyrmtail; Skeleton in cave
request: Bring him some Grundies.
solution: The item can be stolen from Cumulus Hex (#212) and he can be found in a high level Nature grotto. You must use the Minstrel's Pratfall skill to make him laugh and then use Half-Inch to steal from him on the same turn.
reward: Rhapthorne Map; Wonder Pants for repeat
preReq: DLC, access to a high level Nature grotto
notes: Available for download on Jun 3, 2011.

name: Wrecking Wrecks
location: Gittingham Palace ; Bookshelf on 2F
request: Defeat Tyrannosaurus Wrecks (#293).
solution: He is a grotto boss that can be found in high level grottos. Once he is defeated report back to the book.
preReq: DLC, Finish Quest 117, Lv 70+ Sage must be in your party to intiate quest, access to high level grottos
notes: Available for download on Jun 10, 2011.

name: Can We Borya for a Second?
location: Tower of Nod, north of Coffinwell; Man south of the tower
request: Equip Borya's Bouffant, Borya's Robe and Borya's Boots.
solution: Talk to Borya, make your birthday the same date as today and talk to him again, and make you hero a mage and talk to him one more time for the last piece of equipment.
notes: Available for download on Jun 17, 2011.

name: An Immaculate Conception
location: Stornway; Man to the north of the castle on 1F
request: Bring him a Goddess Shield.
solution: Use the Alchemy Pot.
notes: Refer to Alchemy Recipe Guide. Available for download on Jun 24, 2011.

name: Poison Needle 1 Ow 1
location: Swinedimples Academy; Female ghost in the Old School at night
request: Bring Master Moosifer's (#245) HP down to 1 and defeat him with the Poison Needle.
solution: He can be fought in high level Volcano grottos. Do about 900 damage and then attack with Poison Needle. The Poison Needle can be bought in Bloomingdale. Equip your whole party with it if you can.
preReq: DLC, access to high level Volcano grottos
notes: Available for download on Jul 1, 2011.

name: Bleats Me
location: Lonley Coast, east of Zere Rocks; Sheep inside the cave
request: Bring it a Venus's Tear.
solution: You can get one by completing Quest 59.
notes: Available for download on Jul 8, 2011.
